sentence.Network_en: Many companies have struggled valiantly to use less energy and chuck out less rubbish.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多公司都勇敢地努力尝试节约能源，减少垃圾。

sentence.Network_en: He suffered further heart attacks and strokes, all of which he fought valiantly.
sentence.Network_cn: 他还曾遭受心脏病和中风的折磨，但他都顽强地挺了过来。

sentence.Network_en: He faced the enemy valiantly , shuned no difficulties and dangers and would not hesitate to lay down his life if need be.
sentence.Network_cn: 他英勇对敌,不避艰险,赴汤蹈火在所不计.

PerfectNetExp.abs: the West Wing学习笔记 - The West Wing -... ... 9． Desecrate： 亵渎，污辱 10．Valiantly： 勇猛地，英勇地 11．Wimp： 懦弱的人.
Jiu1 | Chinese Dictionary ... 中央研究院 Academia Sinica 雄赳赳 valiantly;gallantly 纠偏 to correct an error.
以v开头的英语英文单词 ... valiant 勇敢的，英勇的 valiantly 勇敢地，英勇地 validate 使…生效.

list.abs: Kim valiantly defends herself as Eli keeps coming ., 金姆勇敢地保卫自己 , 伊菜也继续向她动手动脚.
He valiantly seeks for truth ., 他大胆地探索现实.
trying valiantly to smile through her tears ., 她透过泪水想要挤出笑容.
What it lacks in resources SEPA tries valiantly to regain by appealing to public sentiment ., 通过求助于公众情感 , 环保局大胆尝试着恢复它的财力.

entry.def: A valiant action is very brave and determined, though it may lead to failure or defeat.

example.ex: Despite valiant efforts by the finance minister, inflation rose to 36%.
example.tran: 尽管财政部部长采取了一系列果决措施，通货膨胀率还是涨到了36%。

example.ex: ...a valiant attempt to keep the business going.
example.tran: 为把生意维持下去而作的勇敢尝试

means.word_mean: 1. with valor; in a valiant manner;

auth_sentence.content: The national government spawned from Texas led the charge, and the textbook committee is valiantly continuing those errant ways.
auth_sentence.res_content: The national government spawned from Texas led the charge, and the textbook committee is valiantly continuing those errant ways.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The national government spawned from Texas led the charge, and the textbook committee is valiantly continuing those errant ways.

auth_sentence.content: Our people must struggle under fascism...to continue their struggle valiantly under fascism for the attainment of democracy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our people must struggle under fascism...to continue their struggle valiantly under fascism for the attainment of democracy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our people must struggle under fascism...to continue their struggle valiantly under fascism for the attainment of democracy.

auth_sentence.content: I can only presume it became exhausted and attempted to rest on an open chimney where it valiantly perished.
auth_sentence.res_content: I can only presume it became exhausted and attempted to rest on an open chimney where it valiantly perished.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I can only presume it became exhausted and attempted to rest on an open chimney where it valiantly perished.

sentences.cn: 她透过泪水想要挤出笑容
